action cards.name: Mixed Signal
action cards.description: Play at anytime. Swap another player's face downm 'Set' Attack Card with your dace down. 'Set' Attack Card

action cards.name: Edge Out
action cards.description: Play on another player before they reveal their 'Set' Attack Card. Discard it. They may not attack this turn.

item cards.name: Potion Of Healing
item cards.description: Play this face up immediately when dealt. Tip to gain 25 life points. If used to heal a willing party member other than yourself, place the card in your scoring pile for 3 Prestige.

characters.name: Nyx
characters.description: Nyx goes unnoticed, leaves unscathed, lines her pockets and trusts no one.

characters.name: Ã–rn HammerFist
characters.description: Cold as mountain stone, Orn brawls when he can, levels axe when he must and trusts no one.

characters.name: Vasha The Red
characters.description: Vasha spills blood, sunders hearts, takes what she wants and trusts no one.

characters.name: Talon
characters.description: Weilding a blade named Black Claw. Talon says little, smiles less and trusts no one.

characters.name: Edaiyn Bloodthorn
characters.description: Of noble lineagem Edaiyn is sure of aim, sure of himself and trusts no one.

characters.name: Nephiedra
characters.description: Mage of the distant dunes. Nephiedra honors the dead, adds to their numbers and trusts no one.
